content: As the world is  evolving today so many people are left behind in this technological age and they  seem to be the target of so many fraudsters who have taken the pleasure to exploit these weaknesses from these people. We should make learning and teaching an everyday  thing in our neighborhood and enlighten people who are far backwards about these recent developments The creation of the world first decentralized system is really a revolution that have put the people of the world to an advantage over the cause of having to store your money with a third party included in this process.  Now we can easily store our money in bitcoin saved in wallets e.g the cold wallets   Without someone claiming to be a staff or account manager from the bank telling you,  you have an issue with your bank account or you need to provide certain details for verification of your account In so doing tempering with your money .  Now bitcoin has made convenient for you to be the only one who has watch over your currency   Currently now so many people are experiencing what we know as financial from government controlled fiat currency. I would say bitcoin has come to liberate this world today from such problem and it's just a matter of time before this happens   Despite the rapid movement and verse knowledge of bitcoin been spread around the world so many people in our communities are still left behind on this ground breaking  technological breakthrough..   So I want to use this medium and enlighten everyone in the forum to take the spread of bitcoin as a  community service and help in our own  various way in other to make everyone beneficial to this wonderful initiative..    I myself have started my own community service and have decided to donate some of my computers and planning to start up a  Free seminar class here in my locality to help enlighten more people about this ground breaking Discovery..although I won't say am an expert on cryptocurrency but since I found this forum my knowledge of bitcoin and crypto have increased by a have great margin.. And am looking forward to continue learning so I can pass it on to people that deserves this knowledge.. So I urged everyone to take the spread of bitcoin in our communities as a service to yourself and the community

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: OP, since you say you're still a newbie yourself, the best thing to do for your friends and acquaintances is to invite them to this forum. The fact that many newcomers to the forum, after a month, begin to tell everyone how they teach their neighbors can sometimes be a ticking time bomb. After reading your posts, there is an understanding that you yourself are still in search of the right solutions, so give people the way to the forum so that they can read and communicate with the community on their own and probably gain experience from their mistakes and decisions.
